page.title: 17Royal Visit and Local News
page.content: (The following are extracts from local newspapers).'1982 was a year to remember for the people of Holloway because Princess Anne had come to visit....{Princess Anne}receives some poses from Ruth Higton during her visit to Holloway and also has a talk with reverand Joe Hurst .On her visit she went to see the cub scouts and the brownies of Lea and Holloway. {ORGANISATIONS}from Dethick, Lea and Holloway have joined together to arrange their first village festival in 1985 running from 3-10 May. {CHILDREN IN NEED}In May 1985, knitting needles have been clicking furiously to produce tiny woolen vests for Mother Teresa's 'dustbin babies.' {AUTHORITIE'S}concern over the hardness of the water was expressed at a meeting of Dethick, Lea and Holloway parish council.'
